did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Germany. Oberkommando der Wehrmacht. Fhrerhauptquartier. Stenographischer Dienst conference transcripts

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Germany. Oberkommando der Wehrmacht. Fhrerhauptquartier. Stenographischer Dienst.

did.abstract: Stenographic records of conversations of Adolf Hitler, Fhrer of Germany, with civilian and military aides, relating to German policy during World War II, December 1942-March 1945.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to audio recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material requires at least two weeks advance notice. Please contact the Hoover Institution Archives for further information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Stenographic records of conversations of Adolf Hitler, Fhrer of Germany, with civilian and military aides, relating to German policy during World War II, December 1942-March 1945.
